participant_1.background:
I would brag about my climbing skills and all the amazing places I've been able to go because of them.
i write fiction for fun.
I'm still getting to know my boss.
I love to watch movies, even though it's not the most productive use of my time.
My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.

participant_2.background:
I'm a secret fashion designer, who is hiding my passion to my conservative family.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
I've never been arrested, but I've had my share of run-ins with the law.
I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love.
I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.

content.text: Hello! I'm good, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm a climber, and I love writing fiction.
That's awesome! I'm a secret fashion designer.
Oh, that's cool! What's it like to be a secret fashion designer?
It's a lot of fun, but it can be tough to keep my passion a secret from my conservative family.
I can imagine. I'm glad you can still do what you love, even if you have to keep it a secret.
Thanks. I'm trying to improve my relationships with the people I love, so I'm hoping to tell them soon.
That's great! I hope it goes well.
Thanks. I'm also trying to find a new job, so I'm going to be doing some job interviews this week.
Good luck with your job interviews! I'm sure you'll do great.
